reviewtext: Used this to look at the roof, chimney, stacks to see if major work would be needed after purchase. I know these are normally used for sports or nature, though I didn't have to climb on the roof which they wouldn't allow. You will find the major portion of my reviews rate the product high. We don't have much money, so I spend a lot of time researching a reviewing articles before purchasing, so far this has worked and we have been very happy with 99% of our purchases.
summary: Used while looking at houses to buy
